content: --अग्निः {1} an aggregate of five sacred fires; {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} (अन्वाहार्यपचन or दक्षिण, गार्हपत्य, आहवनीय, सभ्य, and आवसथ्य) {2} a householder who maintains the five sacred fires; पंचाग्नयो धृतव्रताः <ls>Māl. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 3. 185.</ls> {3} five mystic fires supposed to exist in the body. {4} one who is acquainted with the doctrine of these fires.
